verse:
नमः कमलनेत्राय नमः कमलमालिने ।
नमः कमलनाभाय कमलापतये नमः ।।

terms.कमलनेत्राय (kamalanetrāya): To the one with lotus eyes
terms.कमलमालिने (kamalamāline): To the one adorned with lotus garlands
terms.कमलनाभाय (kamalanābhāya): To the one with a lotus-like navel
terms.Salutations to the one with lotus: like eyes, adorned with lotus garlands, with a lotus-like navel, and the lord of lotus.
